record.description: War Bond of 1777 aids campaign to sell current bonds. These girls aiding in the student stamp and bond sales at the University of Chicago display a war bond from 1777 issued to help finance the Revolutionary War to stimulate sales. Left to right are Ellen Parker, Nancy Elliott, Edith Jackson, Jean Harvey, Eleanor Evans and Betsy Wallace.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Attached news clipping. Paint on surface.
